pkgmetadata.longdescription: Comparison of Cumulative Incidence Between Two Groups Under Competing Risks // Statistical methods for competing risks data in comparing cumulative incidence function curves between two groups, including overall hypothesis tests and arbitrary tests in Lyu et al. (2020) doi:10.1002/pst.2028, and the fixed-point tests in Chen et al. (2018) doi:10.1080/03610918.2018.1476697.
